product recall:
SENDER: WOLF
SUBJECT: PRODUCT RECALL (URGENT!)

The Arclight Association, an industrial
trade group within the Assembled Commonwealth,
have issued product recall on an old infantry
drone model. The unit marked 'MR-5' stopped
responding to commands during final trials.
Swift recovery of the rogue unit will be
rewarded.

REWARD:

5000 HWL - Recover 'XR-5' intact

3000 HWL - Recover 'XR-5' damaged

3000 HWL - Identify the fault

TARGET: 'XR-5'                         *           
                                       |           
'Proprietary' combat            /--------\        
drone. Known product           /          \       
of corporate espionage.        |  O      O  |      
Torso-Mounted Rifle            \    <     /       
Array and significant           \ ###### /        
armour. Top speed 51.5           \      /         
clicks per hour.                  \----/
